title: Simple User App (Ionic)
desc: Looking for a developer to create an app. The idea of the app is this....Let’s say that there are 4 people playing. One of those 4 people opens the app and is presented with the apps home screen which has two buttons “Create Group” or “Join Group”.USER CLICKS ON “Create Group”:He clicks “Create Group” and fills some 4 required input fields to create the group. The fields are:Group Name (id)Group Password (password the users need to enter the group)Max Members (2 to 8 people can play)Sound that will play (sounds will be included in the APK, internal)After the group is created, the creator goes to a loading screen that shows how many users out of the max are in the party. For example if 3 out of the max 5 set by the creator are ready to play the screen will show “3/5”USER CLICKS ON “Join Group”:The user clicks “Join Group” and is shown a list of active groups with a search bar on the top of the screen. He can then search for the group created by his friend. Once he finds the group, he can click to fill the password and join the group.THE IDEA OF THE GAMEAll 4 people are now playing. A of 10 seconds starts counting down on ONE of the random users, when the counter reaches 0 there is a 1/7 chance that the sound selected by the creator will go off on that users device if not the counter will go onto the next user and so on until one of the users get unlucky and the sound goes off.AFTER THE SOUNDAfter one of the users loses, the users have the option to “Play again” or “Leave”THAT’S IT!

title: I would like to hire a Mobile App Developer flyer click
desc: Hello;I want to ask about apps such as the following appsClick flyer appOn android and ios operating systems[url removed, login to view]I want you to do the same apps for meapp that is transforming the shopping experience for people like you by creating a single platform with easy access to weekly offers for your family needs, from all the leading retailers. Our aim is to bring to you huge savings on your weekly grocery bills, while making shopping easy and fun.Browse flyers, save offers, create your own shopping list, locate stores and even share your favorite offers with family and friends. You can plan ahead, even before stepping into the store. We bring to you the latest information on the offers to ensure you never miss a great deal again.With ClicFlyer you can find grocery offers online when it suits you and where it suits you - regardless of whether you're at home, on the road or out shopping. If looking for a specific item, you can use the search function and quickly compare offers across the various flyers online. For easy access while shopping, you can save offers and add items in the shopping list with quick sign up process. Also, share your saved offers with your family and friends so they can save money too. In short, with ClicFlyer, you save time and money, as the app gives you access to the largest selection of grocery retailers online and helps you get an overview of the country's many offerings.You can find offers in a number of ways:Trending Offers - Checkout most popular offers in your cityRetailers - Browse latest weekly flyers and thousands of offers from your favorite retailersCategories - Click on various categories to check latest offers you are looking forList of features:- Mark your favorite retailers so that they are always first- Save your offers for easy access while shopping- Simplify weekly shopping with Shopping List. Add, edit and find offers easily.- Tap on offers for additional info - offer period, offer price, similar offers- Learn about retailer stores and use mobile maps to get to the closest branch- Customize your offer search by sorting & filtering on retailers, categories and Brands- Share your favorite offers with your friends & family- Stay updated with alerts for new flyers, nearby offers or expiring offers and more!Give me the price ??And time of programming the apps ?Thank you

title: IOS Developer | Arkit Expert
desc: For this positions you will be tested throughly in real life scenarios in order to get the job. Your job is fully remote and we need you to be online during EST normal operational hours. Provide your monthly salary in USD in the private message. Please note, entries that do not include their monthly salary and ARkit example work will be disqualified.Are you ready to explore a new application domain with a talented and collaborative team? 3iQs's Technology Development Group is seeking a hands-on leader to help shape and guide the development of graphically intense and highly interactive applications. Our team is working with some of 3iQ's most advanced technologies including the augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) support offered in ARKit and Metal 2. As a leader within our creative organization, you will have a uniquely rewarding opportunity to craft future products that will delight and inspire millions of people every day.Key QualificationsProficient in one or more of the following languages: SwiftExperience leading teams to develop and ship excellent applications for 3iQ's products (e.g., macOS, iOS, tvOS or watchOS) Fundamental knowledge of software engineering technologies, methodologies and practicesExperienced collaborating with other disciplines including design, art, quality assurance and be capable to know who mobile apps work/look/function/animate in 2017.Expert in integrating maps (changing styling) and adding 3rd party APIs.DescriptionThe ideal person for this role still loves and wants to code but also knows how to increase their impact by guiding the efforts of a team. We're breaking new ground every day, so you'll need to be undeterred by uncertain requirements and shifting dependencies. You'll be leading a dynamic and creative team charged with exploring an uncharted and rapidly evolving domain. You will be researching and developing an entirely new application paradigm - a challenge that will demand rapid experimentation and prototyping without sacrificing quality or attention to detail. Along the way, you'll also help us build a passionate and diverse team that will span a broad range of application categories including productivity, communication, and entertainment.Main RequirementsARkit, Metal,OOP Required! NO messy code, absolutely.Proficient at debugging and performance tuningExperience working with REST, JSON or XML based web services.Experience with multi-threaded software design and working knowledge of the general mobile software design patterns, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies.Camera Integrations with ARkit and Camera manipulations.Experience with CoreDataClose familiarity and understanding of a variety of SDLC modelsInterest or proficiency in UI/UX design Experience with low-level graphics APIs (Metal, OpenGL, DirectX)Experience developing AR/VR applications Familiarity with ARKitPerformace ReviewSecurity ReviewPeer Review & Unit TestingMemory leakage ReviewOAuth and OpenID experienceMobile Sync and Caching ExperienceExperience with modern development methods such as Agile or Scrum. and GIT.Common SenseExcellent written and verbal communication skills.Ability to articulate and present highly-technical concepts, schematics and assets.Solid analytical, critical and creative problem solving skills.Highly-organized and detail-oriented.Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and to engage/adapt quickly.Application packaging and deployment experience highly desired.Knowledge of Agile software development preferred.

title: Reverse Proxy for any IMAP server
desc: Hi. I need the following:a server which receives credentials from end user device and posts them to an IMAP server.For example, an iPhone or an Android would have to change the mail settings to point to this new Intermediary server and this intermediary server is supposed to check the email(IMAP) and hold it for the user instead of the end-user communicating directly with the IMAP server. On the Intermediary server I want the email to be stored accordingly for each end user so I may process it and then after it has been processed I can finally make it available to the end user. If the email pertaining to a user has attachments, the attachments should be sent to another server and classified accordingly. Once they have been processed they could be made available to the end-user but via another path.I could do the project myself but I am in a time crisis. I would suggest JAVA or Python and make it with WEB SERVICES or Python APIs. Please let me know what you can come up with.If it is required we might have a skype call in order to clarify the concepts.Thank you

title: Web Based e-Voucher distribution system
desc: Web Based e-Voucher distribution system for agent/reseller (mulit-level)The aim of this project to build a web based e-voucher card distribution system like vodafone orange etc... the sytem to be based on a back end datbase (mysql) if possible  and a front end client/reseller web or android app log in to process transection.Pin-Based selling: Front-EndThe client should be able to log in to the system via web interface and request voucher pin number.Voucher system provide the customer with voucher information which can be printed via small blutooth printer that connected with android mobile .Client should be able to check their pre-paid balnce, view sales report and commision.The client user friendly interface should be organised in manner: 1:Category – Prepaid cards, Mobile voucher, etc 2: different Operators 3: Products for each operator 4: Denominations for each productBack END- DatabaseThe following functionalities are to be provided through user-friendly interface:the adminstrator should be able to import voucher number via txt or csv file into the datbase.eTopup to provide full information about each agent/reseller registered in the system, including the agent/reseller’s profile, the access rights, and the transactions limits. In addition, the privileged administrator can manage some credit and balance settings for that agent/reseller.The administrator should be able to to define the agent/reseller’s with commission schema for each prodct. (selling price for the client) this would be dectuded from pre-paid balance as the customer process transection.Record and manage agent/reseller pre-paid credit depositsREPORTSThe following reports should be generated from the server.Retailer Balance details, Pin Details, Daily Sales ,Retailer Sales ,Stock Report, Log Report OthersPlease quote price and if there is any similer demo like thisthanks

title: IOS/Android App Design for Coupon Sales
desc: I am trying to build a "Groupon" light that revolves around a playing card theme.I want an app designed for IOS and Android.  The app is for coupon purchase and redemption that has four users.  1) the UNREGISTERED user can browse the coupons available for purchase and can register 2) the REGISTERED user can make an in-app purchase of one set of the coupon deck (52 coupons) and receive a credit that is shown next to or below each coupon.  When the registered user goes to redeem the coupon, he/she presents their phone to the business and the business owner presses a "Redeem button" on the coupon and then types in a four digit pin to reduce the coupon credit by one unit (I'm open to alternative redemption methods).  3) the BUSINESS OWNER can log into the app to change the text of his/her one coupon.  He/she can also view the performance statistics for each coupon to include date coupon (text changed) began/ended and number of redemptions for that coupon.  There should also be a profit-calculator feature where the business owner can go to the statistics and enter in a profit estimate per redemption for each coupon and see the sum total of profit.  I would also like them to be able to see the total number of redemptions and the number of unique users who contributed towards those redemptions.  4) the ADMIN user needs access to each business account and the ability to disable/enable the account.  The Admin should also be able to view registration, coupon purchase, and coupon redemption statistics by week and in total.  The Admin user will also need to be able to collect payment from the registered user through the app (I'm not sure how that works).User Interface/Experience Design:There are only 52 coupons in this app, and each coupon is shaped like a playing card with a card value, an image to represent the business, the general business card information (name/address/phone/website), and the deal text (which the business owner can edit).The coupon will be imported into the app as an image, though the app design should allow for a text display box to appear within the card to show the deal that the business is offering.Search Feature:When the unregistered/registered user opens the app, the should first see our logo/banner followed by a search bar.  The user can search by any word in a business name, or by card suit or card value (hearts, two of hearts, 2 of hearts, etc.).  The search results should show the card images in order by best search fit.Browse Feature: Below the search bar, the user should see a drop down menu that offers six sort features for the 52 cards.  The first, and the default, is "Alphabetical." This sorts the cards in order by their card name.  The second is by "Suit," this sorts the cards by descending card values (Ace-2) in the order of Hearts, Diamonds, Clubs, and Spades.  The third is by "Hearts."  The fourth is by "Diamonds." The fifth is by "Clubs," and the sixth is by "Spades."I will need a recommendation from your team as to where and how I can give directions to the user for how to use the app and purchase a deck of cards (1 unit of each coupon).There will also be confirmation pages (coupon deck purchased, account creation, coupon redeemed), a terms of agreement page, and an error page (something went wrong with your purchase).See the attachment for what a playing card will look like and where the deal text box should be displayed for each card.  Note, there will be card values on each card image as well (Ace of Hearts, etc).  I will be providing the designs for all 52 cards.

title: Sleep Cycle/ REM Monitoring Application
desc: Create an app that can monitor and record one's sleep cycle, identify when a REM cycle has begun, and include a smart alarm. Ideally this will be completed by a programmer who has completed a sleep cycle project before. We are also open to licensing existing sleep cycle algorithms.1.) The app MUST be able to recognize the beginning of REM cycles in real time.2.) The logic behind monitoring one's sleep cycle will not be provided by me, but the developer must already have this knowledge and know how to create the sleep cycle app.3.) The app would ideally be iphone and android compatible.4.) We would also like your first message to describe how you will determine a REM cycle has begun (probably through monitoring movements and sounds during sleep through the phones' accelerometer and speakers), your background in creating sleep related apps or doing sleep related research. If you do not write this information you will not receive a response.Thanks for your time. We hope to hear from you soon.

title: Make ios app approved by apple store
desc: Hi,I hired a app developer to warp my website into a native frame, but we had reject 3 times, below is the details for the rejection, if you have experience that how make the app get approve please bid only experience freelancer.From Apple4. 2 Design: Minimum FunctionalityThank you for your resubmission, however you still need to address the issues from your previous rejection.Guideline 4.2 - Design - Minimum FunctionalityYour app provides a limited user experience as it is not sufficiently different from a mobile browsing experience. As such, the experience it provides is similar to the general experience of using Safari. Including iOS features such as push notifications, Core Location, and sharing do not provide a robust enough experience to be appropriate for the App Store.Next StepsTo resolve this issue, please revise your app to provide a more robust user experience by including additional native iOS functionality.If you cannot - or choose not to - revise your app to be in compliance with the App Store Review Guidelines, you may wish to build an HTML5 web app instead. You can distribute web apps directly on your web site; the App Store does not accept or distribute web apps.For more information about creating web apps, refer to the Configuring Web Applications section of the Safari Web Content Guide.For a description of the HTML elements and attributes you can use in Safari on iPhone, check out Safari HTML Reference: Introduction.

title: A partnership with app developer - The developer develops and gives support and I resell in my country
desc: For this project there is no money for me and the developers before I resell the use of the system to stores in my country. The developer develops the android app and gives support on technical issues, and if we have success in the future, also develops the IOs app - there are already examples of this app on playstore. It is an app based on selling apps of stores with features that are a little different. In total, around 60 features need to be implemented, many of these are already used in most of the these kinds of apps. The developeres need to develop it and my team and I resell it in my country and make visists to these stores to show the functions and sell the use of the system (we need a superadmin and admin web page - where store owners can register their products and specifications). Every moth there will be incomes and the app developer and me will share the profits. I can assure that if you believe this project and invest your time on it, you and I can get huge ammounts of money. If you believe it and want more details of it, we can make history together. Jump in and help me change the way things have being done until now! In this area things can be done in a different and better way! Please drop your message my friend!

title: Application Development Project Manager
desc: Min. Experience: Manager/SupervisorWe are seeking an entrepreneurial minded, dedicated, and motivated employee that is interested in joining and directing a fast-paced development of a Mobile Application & Software Development project. The ideal candidate will possess direct working experience as a Software Development Project Manager, as well as a proven history of about 10+ years of hands on coding experience, including up to 5+ years in mobile app development. The Project Manager will be involved in all aspects of the Product and Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) activities on native & hybrid mobile platforms, web applications, and software products.General Responsibilities:Responsible for leading and managing multiple application and software development projects for internal and commercial use, as well as customer specific application development projects. This project will require a constant on-going relationship. This project will lead in to sub-projects.The Mobile Application Project Manager will have proven experience in managing and executing software and application development projects. The candidate will be responsible for managing a team of mobile application developers, both in-house and off-shore development team. The Project Manager will be responsible for establishing project plans in a matrix environment and managing personnel in the execution against the project plan. The resource will be responsible for the team implementing cross-functional hybrid design, continuous integrated improvements and deployment, maintenance, back-end development, UIUX design and development, and technical consulting. The ideal candidate will possess demonstrated progression and growth developing native and hybrid mobile and software applications utilizing a responsive approach for software development on major frameworks including but not limited to native iOS, Android and Hybrid Platforms. The candidate will be required to effectively plan and communicate project goals with executive steering committee and sponsors.
